column4: gordonjck)---i want to install ubuntu and run my normal application ms office visual studio and other exe and executable files
gordonjcp:i want to install ubuntu in my pc and run my normal application ms office visual studio and other exe and executable files
Wine under ubuntu can allow you to run several windows applications. But I wonder why you want to run ubuntu if you're just wanting to use windows apps?
http://appdb.winehq.org/ shows how well wine supports several windows applications on Linux.
